nodes.bodyText: Javadoc needs updating throughout the entire class.
Fixed. I actually had to remove almost all usages of "query" from not only JavaDocs, but also SqlConfig.queryTimeoutMillis property, what required changes to config processors.

Javadoc:
"Executes a distributed query." -> "Executes a SQL statement."
